languages.text: "Предки с Алайтока узрели раны, нанесенные моей душе во время поисков Крудараха и пыток Темных. Раны, не заживавшие многие недели, пока я не могла медитировать и погружаться в свой мир. И они решили помочь мне — залечивали, правили, латали. Но и ты, {name}... Тебя они тоже посчитали раной, что кровоточит в моей душе". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас виновато и обреченно.{/n}

"The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Предки с Алайтока узрели раны, нанесенные моей душе во время поисков Крудараха и пыток Темных. Раны, не заживавшие многие недели, пока я не могла медитировать и погружаться в свой мир. И они решили помочь мне — залечивали, правили, латали. Но и ты, {name}... Тебя они тоже посчитали раной, что кровоточит в моей душе". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас виновато и обреченно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My ancestors from Alaitoc have beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari torture. The wounds that couldn't heal for many weeks while I couldn't meditate and dive into my world. And they have decided to help me — to heal, to patch up, to mend. But you, {name}... They had also thought you one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “之前我在寻找克鲁达拉赫时，以及受到黑暗灵族折磨时，我的心灵受到了创伤。由于我当时无法沉浸冥想，这些伤口也一直无法愈合。阿莱托克的先祖看到了这一切，他们正在我的世界里为我疗愈、补缀、修整。而你，{name}……他们认为你也是我灵魂中的流血的伤口。”{n}伊莉耶特看着你，阴沉的脸上满是愧疚之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “之前我在寻找克鲁达拉赫时，以及受到黑暗灵族折磨时，我的心灵受到了创伤。由于我当时无法沉浸冥想，这些伤口也一直无法愈合。阿莱托克的先祖看到了这一切，他们正在我的世界里为我疗愈、补缀、修整。而你，{name}……他们认为你也是我灵魂中的流血的伤口。”{n}伊莉耶特看着你，阴沉的脸上满是愧疚之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los ancestros de Alaitoc han visto las heridas que la búsqueda de Crudarach y la tortura de los Drukhari infligieron en mi alma. Las heridas que no sanaron en las muchas semanas durante las que fui incapaz de meditar y sumergirme en mi mundo. Y han decidido ayudarme; me curan, me restañan, me restablecen. Pero tú, {name}... A ti también te vieron como una de las heridas sangrantes de mi alma». {n}Yrliet te mira con expresión pesimista y culpable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los ancestros de Alaitoc han visto las heridas que la búsqueda de Crudarach y la tortura de los Drukhari infligieron en mi alma. Las heridas que no sanaron en las muchas semanas durante las que fui incapaz de meditar y sumergirme en mi mundo. Y han decidido ayudarme; me curan, me restañan, me restablecen. Pero tú, {name}... A ti también te vieron como una de las heridas sangrantes de mi alma». {n}Yrliet te mira con expresión pesimista y culpable.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mes ancêtres d'Alaitoc ont vu les blessures qu'a subies mon âme lors de ma quête de Crudarach et des tortures infligées par les Drukharis. Comme j'étais incapable de méditer ou de m'immerger dans mon monde intérieur, elles ont mis plusieurs semaines avant de commencer à cicatriser. Ils ont décidé de m'aider en les soignant, en les nettoyant et en recousant les lésions. Mais vous, {name}... Ils ont considéré que vous étiez vous aussi une blessure qui saignait dans mon âme. » {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard où se mêlent tristesse et culpabilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes ancêtres d'Alaitoc ont vu les blessures qu'a subies mon âme lors de ma quête de Crudarach et des tortures infligées par les Drukharis. Comme j'étais incapable de méditer ou de m'immerger dans mon monde intérieur, elles ont mis plusieurs semaines avant de commencer à cicatriser. Ils ont décidé de m'aider en les soignant, en les nettoyant et en recousant les lésions. Mais vous, {name}... Ils ont considéré que vous étiez vous aussi une blessure qui saignait dans mon âme. » {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard où se mêlent tristesse et culpabilité.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Ahnen von Alaitoc haben die Wunden gesehen, die meine Seele bei der Suche nach Crudarach und der Folter durch die Drukhari erlitten hat. Die Wunden, die wochenlang nicht heilten, sodass ich nicht meditieren und in meine Welt eintauchen konnte. Und sie beschlossen, mir zu helfen – mich zu heilen, zusammenzuflicken, wiederherzustellen. Aber Euch, {name} ... Euch hielten sie auch für eine der Wunden, die in meiner Seele bluten." {n}Yrliet sieht dich düster und schuldbewusst an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Ahnen von Alaitoc haben die Wunden gesehen, die meine Seele bei der Suche nach Crudarach und der Folter durch die Drukhari erlitten hat. Die Wunden, die wochenlang nicht heilten, sodass ich nicht meditieren und in meine Welt eintauchen konnte. Und sie beschlossen, mir zu helfen – mich zu heilen, zusammenzuflicken, wiederherzustellen. Aber Euch, {name} ... Euch hielten sie auch für eine der Wunden, die in meiner Seele bluten." {n}Yrliet sieht dich düster und schuldbewusst an.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アレイトックの父祖は、クルダラの捜索とデュカーリの拷問で我の魂に負わされた傷を見ていた。その傷は、我が瞑想することも、自分の世界に没入することもできずにいた間、何週間も癒えることはなかった。そして彼らは我を助けようと決めた…我を癒し、手当てをし、回復させようとした。だがお前、{name}は…彼らは、お前のことも我の魂の中で血を流している傷の一つだと考えている」{n}ユリエットは憂鬱そうな、後ろめたい表情であなたを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「アレイトックの父祖は、クルダラの捜索とデュカーリの拷問で我の魂に負わされた傷を見ていた。その傷は、我が瞑想することも、自分の世界に没入することもできずにいた間、何週間も癒えることはなかった。そして彼らは我を助けようと決めた…我を癒し、手当てをし、回復させようとした。だがお前、{name}は…彼らは、お前のことも我の魂の中で血を流している傷の一つだと考えている」{n}ユリエットは憂鬱そうな、後ろめたい表情であなたを見ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Alaitoc'lu atalarım, Crudarach'ı arayışım ve Drukhari işkencesi sırasında ruhumda açılan yaraları gördü. Meditasyon yapamadığım ve dünyamın derinlerine dalamadığım dönemde haftalarca iyileşmeyen yaralarıma baktılar. Bana yardım etmeye, iyileştirmeye, yamalamaya ve onarmaya karar verdiler. Fakat sen {name}... Senin de ruhumda kanayan yaralardan biri olduğunu düşündüler." {n}Yrliet, kederli ve suçlu bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The ancestors from Alaitoc beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they decided to help me — to heal me, patch me up, mend me. But you, {name}... They also thought you were one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Alaitoc'tan atalarım, Crudarach arayışı ve Drukhari işkencesi sırasında ruhumda açılan yaraları gördüler. Meditasyon yapamadığım ve dünyamın derinlerine dalamadığım uzun haftalar boyunca iyileşmeyen yaralara baktılar. Bana yardım etmeye, iyileştirmeye, yamalamaya ve onarmaya karar verdiler. Fakat sen {name}... Senin de ruhumda kanayan yaralardan biri olduğunu düşündüler." {n}Yrliet, kederli ve suçlu bir bakışla sana bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
